title: playing on servers in other countries
body: does playing in a server other than your country (for example, if i am in china and playing in na server) cause lag and connectivity issues? i am having a lot of those recently, more than usual, and although it may just be my internet i am wondering if it is my server. i also use a vpn sometimes (that connects to na) but that doesn't seem to help, so it could be something else?

replies.body: If you are playing on NA but are located in China, then you have a very large physical distance that can certainly cause some latency issues.  You can use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network, but keep in mind that the long distance to reach the game server will be an obstacle no matter how you route.  Hope that helps clear things up!
